title: Kazan (1949 film)
text:
Kazan is a 1949 American <a href="drama%20%28film%20and%20television%29">drama</a> <a href="western%20%28genre%29">western</a> film directed by <a href="Will%20Jason">Will Jason</a> and starring <a href="Stephen%20Dunne%20%28actor%29">Stephen Dunne</a>, <a href="Lois%20Maxwell">Lois Maxwell</a> and <a href="Joe%20Sawyer">Joe Sawyer</a>. It is based on a novel by <a href="James%20Oliver%20Curwood">James Oliver Curwood</a> which had previously been made into a 1921 <a href="Kazan%20%281921%20film%29">silent film of the same title</a>.
The film's sets were designed by the <a href="art%20director">art director</a> <a href="Paul%20Palmentola">Paul Palmentola</a>.
